pages.title: iBored
pages.content: iBored is a cross-platform social media app that allows users to connect with each other and easily organize small activities and group events

pages.title: Friends
pages.content: Easily add and organize friends. Seamlessly create chats with friends and groups of friends

pages.title: Customization
pages.content: Easily customize your profile and the types of notifications you get

footer.blurb: iBored is currently in closed beta, but check back soon for more information!
